Description: About the job UX/UI DesignerOur client is a solution provider in the information technology & telecommunication sectors with a focus on the following service areas: IT Infrastructure Solutions, IT Managed Services, Cloud Enablement and Data Centre Infrastructure (including on-premises, public/private/or hybrid), Carrier-grade Telecom Infrastructure, Products and Solutions, Telecom Security, Lawful Intercept, and Fraud Prevention. They are operating offices in UAE, KSA and South Africa.They are looking for an experienced UX/UI Designer to join their team in Beirut.Job Summary:They are looking for a UI/UX Designer to turn clients software / platforms into easy-to-use products.As a UI/UX Designer, your responsibilities include gathering user requirements, designing graphic elements and building navigation components.Main DutiesGather and evaluate customer requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineersDevelop personas and usage scenariosCreate wireframes (mock-ups of applications), storyboards, sitemaps and screen flowsDefine interaction models, user task flows, and UI (user interface) specificationsDevelop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look likeProficiency in visual communication and finding creative ways to solve UX problemsPrepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholdersIdentify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)Conduct concept and usability testing and gather feedbackRun user testing of applications, software and websitesConduct layout adjustments based on user feedbackConsider existing applications and evaluate their UX (user experience) effectivenessAssist with content developmentAnalyze user feedback and activity, and iterating to enhance the user experienceCommunicate design ideas and prototypes to designers and developersSkills
Skills: To be successful in this role, you should have experience with design software and wireframe tools. If you also have a portfolio of professional design projects that includes work with web/mobile applications, we'd like to meet you.
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Web Development, or related fields
Proven 3 years of experience as a UX Designer, UI Designer, or similar role
Proficient in using wireframing and prototyping tools such as: UXPin, Balsamiq, Adobe XD, Figma,
Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop
Some knowledge of HTML and CSS is a plus
Familiarity with digital/interaction design and information architecture
Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders
Self-development skills to keep up to date with fast-changing trends
Professional approach to time, costs and deadlines
